summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Super Admin system. All 20 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with KPI dashboard, users management, finance console, and audit logs. Role-based access control working correctly - admin users are denied access to /superadmin routes.
passed_tests: Super admin login (super@admin.com / admin12) - successful authentication with super_admin role
Admin login (admin@admin.com / admin12) - successful authentication with admin role only
GET /api/superadmin/dashboard - returns comprehensive stats (KPIs, finance, charts, queues)
GET /api/superadmin/users - returns paginated user list with filters
GET /api/superadmin/users?role=seller - filters users by role correctly
GET /api/superadmin/users/{id} - returns user detail with wallet info
POST /api/superadmin/wallet/credit - credits wallet and creates audit log
POST /api/superadmin/wallet/debit - requires admin password (step-up confirmation)
POST /api/superadmin/wallet/freeze - requires admin password (step-up confirmation)
GET /api/superadmin/admin-actions - returns audit logs with filters
Role-based access: Admin denied /api/superadmin/dashboard (403)
Role-based access: Admin denied /api/superadmin/users (403)
Role-based access: Admin denied /api/superadmin/admin-actions (403)
Role-based access: Admin denied /api/superadmin/wallet/credit (403)
Role-based access: Unauthenticated denied /api/superadmin/dashboard (401)
Frontend: Super Admin Dashboard shows KPI cards (Total Users, Sellers, Active Listings, etc.)
Frontend: Finance Overview section with deposits, withdrawals, escrow, frozen funds
Frontend: Orders and Revenue charts (Last 14 Days)
Frontend: Listing Status and KYC Status distribution pie charts
Frontend: System Health section with DB connection and scheduler status
Frontend: Users Management page with search, filters, and user detail dialog
Frontend: User detail shows wallet info (Available, Frozen) and action buttons
Frontend: Finance Console with user search, wallet view, and Credit/Debit/Freeze/Unfreeze buttons
Frontend: Ledger History shows previous admin wallet operations
Frontend: Audit Logs page with action type and target type filters
Frontend: Admin user redirected away from /superadmin routes (access denied)
seed_data_creation: Used existing test users. Wallet credit operations created audit log entries.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Super Admin system fully tested. All /superadmin/* routes require super_admin role. Dashboard at /superadmin shows KPIs, finance overview, charts, and action queues. Users management at /superadmin/users allows viewing user details with wallet info. Finance console at /superadmin/finance allows credit/debit/freeze operations with step-up confirmation for dangerous actions. Audit logs at /superadmin/audit-logs shows all admin actions with filters. Role-based access control verified - admin users are redirected away from /superadmin routes.
